name: Root beer jelly candy
description:
Recipe also works well with flavor West root beer but you have to bring the percentage way down between .75 and .5%. 

Tried this with super sweet and just wasn't getting the right sweetness... that said super sweet would be a bad substitution at .5%


If you'd like to participate in the Year of Mixing find the Flavor-Pro group and join us for our weekly challenge - all mixers welcome - and there will be some prizes. You can find more information here http://flavor-pro.com/the-year-of-mixing/
author: Chrisdvr1
